Header.title: Your Local Hands in Fethiye
Header.paragraph: Share your needs with us and we will help you find the best solution for you.

About.paragraph: We travelled around many cities and countries. While trying to live somewhere short-time or long-time period, need to local,trustable friends to ask the best way to do something. Because of this we know your needs and we will help you find the best solution for you.
Why: Both of us are working hard to make your life easier
Why2: We are not a company, we are a family

Services.name: Find a house for rent
Services.text: We can help you find a suitable house for you and your family according to your budget. Even if talk for you and walk around the real estates with car.

Services.name: Houseworks and repairs
Services.text: Renting a house is not enough. You need to do some houseworks and repairs. We can help you with cleaning, painting, plumbing, electrical, repairs, etc.

Services.name: State affairs and support
Services.text: Registering your house address to the state and getting a certificate of ownership. Bank, internet , water, electricity, etc. account opening and maintaining.

Services.name: Daily life and culture
Services.text: We can find the suitable car and motorbicyles from the trustable rental agencies. Pet hospital, cheaper hospital solitions, mobile phone line openings , etc.

Services.name: Travel
Services.text: In order to travel to the places you want to go, we can help you with the best agencies to work with.

Services.name: Tourism Tours
Services.text: Parachuting, boat trips, camping, safari tours, turkish cuisine tours and many more.

Features.title: Find a house for rent
Features.text: We can help you find a suitable house for you and your family

Features.title: Daily Routines
Features.text: In your daily routines, you can find the best solutions for your problems.

Features.title: State Affairs
Features.text: Let us help you do your state related affairs like residency, electricity and water subscription.

Features.title: Joyful Tours
Features.text: Take a breath and enjoy the beautiful activities of our city.
